comments:
Description:
The aggregation builder in crosstab's binding page should be consistent with the one in palette

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071120-0800

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cube
2, New a crosstab using the cube
3, Go to crosstab's binding page and add an Aggregation
4, Specify the SUM function and click OK
5, Remove the column dimension from crosstab

Expected result:
If the data field is required, the OK button should be gray

Actual result:
All the functions which is data field required can be created without the data field. It will lead some issue when do step5, and exception occurs

Error log:
java.lang.IllegalStateException: FAILED ASSERTION
	at org.mozilla.javascript.Kit.codeBug(Kit.java:480)
	at org.mozilla.javascript.TokenStream.<init>(TokenStream.java:82)
	at org.mozilla.javascript.Parser.parse(Parser.java:313)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapExpressionCompiler.getReferencedDimLevel(OlapExpressionCompiler.java:206)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapExpressionCompiler.getReferencedDimLevel(OlapExpressionCompiler.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapExpressionCompiler.getReferencedDimLevel(OlapExpressionCompiler.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapQueryUtil.validateBinding(OlapQueryUtil.java:62)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.adapter.impl.CubeQueryUtil.getInvalidBindings(CubeQueryUtil.java:636)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.internal.ui.editors.model.CrosstabAdaptUtil.removeInvalidBindings(CrosstabAdaptUtil.java:404)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.internal.ui.editors.model.CrosstabAdaptUtil.processInvaildBindings(CrosstabAdaptUtil.java:385)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.item.crosstab.internal.ui.editors.action.DeleteDimensionViewHandleAction.run(DeleteDimensionViewHandleAction.java:79)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 193854 ***
